Recommended. Used it in a kindergarten class
Great way to teach young children how to stay safe...Barney has a gentle way of teaching these issues of safety!

My baby boy loves it and hums and tries to sing the song all day long. He pushes replay about 50 times to that
program when he sees the children laughing and singing, he begins to run and sing as well. I suppose he puts
himself in that film.. It makes him happy!!! AND that makes me happy!!  Thanks!!!

Videos are an exceptional way to help kids learn important things~ especially when they will want to watch over and over~ and with this cast of characters they will! Repetition is the key to learning!
my three year old loves thomas and this product arrived just in time for his holidays dispite the extra parcels that were prob causing delays. i am happy with this purchas!
Sadly, we only get Sprout when our dish provider has a 'free weekend'.  Our toddler loves Sprout, so this DVD lets him see his favorite friends (and Chicka).  Win-Win.

I think this DVD is awesome!  My boys are 2 and 3 and they are just starting to do stuff that they need to be more prepared for.  The episodes in this DVD (which the Let's Grow series is only available on DVD) are all abut safety issues that kids face everyday.  They include what to do when there is a fire, encourage kids to wear their helmets, be safe during cooking, work together, using a first aid kit, buckling up and more!  My sons were really enjoying this DVD and I think it was registering with them that they are supposed to do those things to keep themselves safe.  I don't think kids are stupid and if it takes a big purple dinosaur to teach my son to wear a bike helmet, then so be it!  What is great is that this DVD features all the popular Sprout characters so kids are not only watching their favorite tv friends but also hoping gaining some knowledge from it!  I love the bright animation and that the DVD is over an hour of fun!
